From the brand

Bamworld brings modern designs to transform your home that will surely space saving need for your home. In addition, we offers a variety of furniture for different families. We believe that quality material and unique design can get more customers love. so we design and produce different furniture for you to live a more comfortable and stylish life.

Large Plant Stand

Corner Plant Stand

Tall Plant Stand

【7 Pots Plant Stand】Unique design capable of holding 7 pot plants. The plant stand can be used as a decorative piece to organize your selection of plants. The stand is suitable for use indoors and outdoors.
【Durable And Sturdy】Wider width (12 inch) and clever use of the triangle stability principle makes the wood plant holder more stable.Also, plastic joints consolidate this plant stand.All of these give you more durable structure.
【Natural Wood With Carbonization】This plant rack is made of natural wood which underwent 1000 °F high temperature carbonization. Because of the carbonization process, no varnish or paint is required thus it is more safe for use and environmentally friendly
【Easy To Assemble】Explicit instruction and plastic joints make it easy to assemble. You may finish it within 15 minutes. We also offer you all tools may need.
【180 Days Worry-free Warranty】We offer 180 days warranty and 24h friendly customer service. If there are ever any issues about the product, please feel free to contact us and we will give you a free replacement or full refund.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $36.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:23:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Original Rollerblade Style Office Chair Wheels, Safe for All Floors.

1 Safe for All Floors 2 Hardwood 3 Carpet 4 Laminate / Vinyl / Tile

Universal Size – Fits 98% of All Office Chairs

These chair casters are the universal size and fit 98% of all office chairs on the market. If they don’t fit your specific chair, no problem, we’ll take care of you.

Quick & Easy Installation

No tools required at all! Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop in the new ones. Replacing your chair wheels is easy and takes less than 30 seconds.

Our Lifetime Promise to You

Our lifetime promise has no expiration. So if you EVER have any issues with your new chair casters, we’ll send you a brand new set.

The ORIGINAL Rollerblade Style Chair Wheels!

We were the first to introduce rollerblade style wheels for office chair, way back in 2016. Designed in the USA, we continue to evolve and improve these office chair wheels.

The Office Oasis Featured on PBS Show ‘StartUP’

The co-founders of The Office Oasis, Meredith and Kevin, were featured on the PBS show StartUp. They shared their story on how they started a growing e-commerce business with just one simple idea.

★ LIFETIME WARRANTY – Our warranty never expires, so if you EVER have any issues, we’ll send you a brand new set of wheels. There are many cheaper knock offs available, but we’re the only brand that offers and stands behind a full lifetime warranty.
★ SAFE FOR ALL FLOORS – Many chair wheels use cheap, low quality materials that destroy your flooring. We don’t. Encased with soft, polyurethane material our rollerblade style wheels are guaranteed not to scratch or leave marks on any surface (including hardwood, carpet, tile, laminate and more).
★ QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION – No tools required! Easily remove and replace the wheels in your desk chair in less than 30 seconds. Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop these in. Check out our quick replacement video for more details.
★ UNIVERSAL SIZE – Upgrade any rolling office chair with these smooth caster wheels. The universal size stem will fit almost every office chair on the market. If for some reason they don’t fit your specific chair, we’ll give you a full refund and even pay the return shipping.
★ SUPPORTS UP TO 650 LBS – Manufactured with the best available materials these casters are built to last a lifetime. Heat treated high-grade steel, precision ball bearings, and durable polyurethane provide years of effortless rolling. The heavy duty chair wheels easily support 650 lbs.

The Office Oasis

Functional, Modern Office Essentials That Look & Feel Good

Previous page

  2. Message from the Brand Owners

    “We want you to be absolutely thrilled with your purchase. So if you ever need anything, just let us know!”

    -Meredith & Kevin

  3. Explore More

    Visit the Store

  4. As Seen on PBS

    Co-Founders Meredith and Kevin share their story on the PBS show Start Up.

  5. Our Story – We’re a small family owned business that started with one simple idea. Rollerblade wheels on office chairs so people everywhere could protect their hardwood floors.

    Our Mission – To create functional office essentials that look & feel good. Because you deserve to work in a space that you love.

    Our Promise – We’ll do everything possible to make sure you are absolutely thrilled with your purchase. No matter what, we are here for you.

/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}

Introductions:
Our Chair Floor Mat is made of thick PVC and free of the BPA.It measures 1.5mm in height, give your floor and furniture the best protection with this product.
Sturdy yet lasting material protects flooring against harsh scuffs and scratches that desk chair can cause.
In addition to its considerable strength, the hard-flooring mat also impresses with all the comforts you can expect from a high-quality office chair underlay.
Features:
-Offer a protection solution for hard floor and carpet tiles
-Anti-slip designed to achieve a strong grip without piercing or damaging your floor
-Crack and scratch resistant under standard use
-Extremely durable and impact-resistant
-Transparent
-Suitable for hardwood floor
Specifications:
-Size:47*36inches
-Weight:4.4lbs
-Material:PVC
– Thickness:0.06inches

Warm Tips
1.These mats may be rolled when packaged. In such cases, the PVC material may take a few hours to return to its original shape once unpacked.
2.The mat should be placed smooth side down (facing the floor), textured side up.

Please follow below steps:
1. Spread chair mat, begin to roll back from the front direction, put a night,it will naturally flat out.
2.Or get some warm water to make it soften, spread it to the opposite direction down.
PVC CHAIR MAT FOR LIGHT USE:Suitable for hardwood floor：vinyl, hardwood, laminate, stone, tile and concrete. Not recommended for carpet. You can use it in the office, at home and so on. It’s very convenient.
ANTI-SLIP:Frosting on the surface can achieve a strong grip which prevent the chair from slipping while controlling the roll of the chair which also helps to considerably reduce the risk of leg fatigue.
DURABILITY:The floor mat is stronger and more durable.You don’t have to worry about bending when you use it, or accidentally breaking it and causing scratches.It’s designed are designed to provide high impact resistance.
HEALTHY MATERIAL:Made of PVC and free of the BPA. It contains no volatile toxin, no special odor, for a healthy indoor environment.Even if your child is lying on the chair mat, you can rest assured.
PROTECTIVE FLOOR:Help to protect your floor from scratches and damage caused by office chair casters and protect your floor. It’s made to be convenient for persons who constantly move around in office chair.

4

Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games, and Pressman’s folding wooden Mancala board offers an affordable way to play that makes a great travel game as well as a wonderful home edition. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. It sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning. The winner is the player who collects the most stones! This folding Mancala includes a hinged wooden playing board, 48 plastic stones, and complete instructions.
Invented thousands of years ago, Mancala is one of the world’s favorite games of counting and strategy
Hinged wooden board folds for easy storage, making it a great choice for home and travel
Reinforces STEM and STEAM skills
Tested for safety and quality
For 2 players, ages 6 and up


Read more


Mancala Wooden Folding Set by Pressman, Ages 6 and Up, 2 Players

Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. The player who collects the most stones wins!




Easy to learn gameplay

This classic game with simple rules is loved by kids and adults alike! Players drop stones into pockets on the board as they try to capture the stones in their opponent’s pockets to win!

Reinforces STEM skills

Mancala sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning.

Great for home and travel

The folding wooden board easily stores all pieces in a convenient compact size, making this a great choice for home or travel.

Read more

Mancala – Wooden Folding Set Mancala for Kids Mexican Train Dominoes Family Classics Chess Mastermind
Description In this game of strategy, players scoop up stones and count them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. Drop a stone into an empty pocket on your side to capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. Collect the most stones to win! Now kids can enjoy the classic game of Mancala in this special edition where the gemstones are replaced with cute plastic animals! With just a few easy rules to follow, the object is to collect the most animals by the end of the game to win. Introduce your family to a new way to play the old classic game of dominoes! Play all the dominoes from your hand onto one or more chains, or “trains,” leading from a central hub. Can’t play? Use the colorful trains to mark the end of your turn. This is the perfect chess set to add to your family game collection and is great for both beginners and experienced players. This set includes a folding chess board and full-size Staunton chess pieces, which features a 2.63″ King. It’s Codemaker vs. Codebreaker to find who will be the Mastermind! The Codemaker creates a secret code. The Codebreaker tries to match the code using logic, deduction and a little bit of luck. Can you crack the code in 10 moves or less?
Minimum Age 6+ 6+ 6+ 8+ 8+
Minimum Players 2 2 1 2 2
Maximum Players 2 2 8 2 2

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:02 UTC – Details)

From the brand

GARTOL Gardening Tools

Not sure how to get your GARTOL product to work correctly?

Contact our friendly support team for quick solutions.

The GARTOL is a 20 years old and professional brand in the United States. Our products are famous for high quality. We are specialized in manufacturing a wide range of garden tools comprising lopper, hedge shears, grass shears, hand pruners, hand saw, cultivator, rake, flower stand, and so on. All the products are sold to many countries and areas, including Europe, the USA, Australia, and East-south Asia.

Pump sprayer, Pruning shears

GARTOL Tools

ANTIRUST SK 5 STEEL BLADE Sharp sturdy blade, ideal for cutting chamfer, round molds, trunking and pvc strips, rubber gaskets, molding and weatherstrip.
HIGH-PRECISION ENGRAVING SCALE Clear and precise scale surface to help you cut accurately. Adjustable slider on the scale surface allows for a 45°-135°cutting angle, free to cut the trunking to different shape when needed.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED HANDLE Strong and durable integrated handle is made of aluminum alloy and PPC anti-skid cover. Comfortable grip no hand fatigue for long-term use.
TURN CLASP SAFETY LOCK The turn clasp closure is easy to close and open, safe and convenient, you no need to worry about being accidentally scratched by the blade.
REPLACEABLE BLADE This trunking scissors set includes additional Spare Sharp heavy duty replaceable blade. Notice this shear is not suitable for cutting metal and stainless steel.

Have you ever had problems measuring your material only to realize it is slightly off and have to redo the entire thing?

If you’ve ever installed small moldings, such as quarter round, you’ll immediately recognize the utility of these miter shears.

GARTOL miter shears are perfect for all your installation needs to save you TIME. Use for cutting time trim, PVC piping, quarter round, tack strip, and other light materials.

Toggle to adjust the angle you want

The basic shear has a jaw with right and left 45° fences, and incised markings for 60°, 75°, 90°, 105°, 120°and 135°. Free to cut the trunking to a different shape when needed.

Don’t waste time measuring and cutting when you can do both at the same time with our Miter Cutters.

Read more

Multi-function angle shears great for cutting chamfer, shoe molding, trunking and wood parts for carpet.

Handy for odd trimming jobs, rubber plastic edge strip, PVC trunking corner, PVC edge strip, semi-circular strip, thin wooden splicing, and so on.

Snipping dowel and rods and all those other tasks too hard for scissors, yet too small for a saw. These multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.

Works effectively with softwoods up to 3/4″ in size.

Read more

The set includes additional spare sharp, heavy-duty replaceable blade

Our miter cutter has 2 Sk-5 steel blades, non-slip ergonomically designed handle, high-precision engraving scale, clasp safety lock.

  1. Premium stainless steel blade comes ready to take on any job, including cutting PVC, piping, wood trim, wires, or other similar materials without pulling out big materials.
  2. Whether you’re a handy person looking for a new tool or a professional with specific needs, these multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.
  3. Our tools come with a full steel frame and ergonomic rubber soles that provide great traction and comfort to help the hand when applying pressure on the cutter.
  4. Our pre-attached angled reference saves you a load of time and the hassle of measuring the angle trying to cut. Helps with accuracy and efficiency for your angle measuring needs

Read more

NOT SATISFIED?

If you are not completely happy please get in touch with us before leaving negative feedback. We can’t help you if you don’t let us know for assistance.

Please let us know via your Amazon order or our Amazon store. Enjoy GARTOL’s 1-year after-sales policy.

Thank you!

From the brand

Ruitool Saw

How did we get our start?

Ruitool is specialises in woodworking tools and we have a wide range of tools that will make your work more efficient and convenient.

What makes our products unique?

1.Durable & Flexible Saw Blade

2.SK5 high-carbon steel

3.Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

4.Comfortable Handle

Why do we love what we do?

Our staff have previous experience in woodworking. We know exactly which products are really effective and easy to use. And we hope that our products will make your work easier and more enjoyable.

【Durable & Flexible Saw Blade】: The hand saw blade is made of SK5 high-carbon steel. The Japanese pull saw teeth are processed by a high-frequency hardening machine imported from Japan, and the hardness can reach HRC60-63 degrees.
【Double Edged】: One side of Japanese hand saw is 17TPI for cutting hardwood, and the other side is 14TPI for cutting softwood.
【Hardened 3-Edge Teeth】: The hand saw has three-sided grinding gear design, sharp edge, faster chip removal, and smoother cutting.
【Comfortable Handle】: Exquisite beech wood handle and slight curve design make the saw handle comfortable to hold, and the operation is more labor-saving.
【Enrich Your Woodworking Life】: Straight shank double-sided small hand saw, small and light, suitable for fine cutting and small parts production, it is the best choice for woodworking DIY.

Flexible Saw Blade

Wood saw with 1/50” ultra-thin saw blade, light weight and flexible, high toughness and wear-resistant, suitable for joinery flush cutting.

Comfortable Beech Handle

Ryoba saw non-slip durable beech wood handle, compact and beautiful. Very suitable for woodworking beginners.

Two Different TPI

Double edged design, one side tooth is 14TPI, other size is 17TPI. Can better meet different cutting needs.

Hardened 3-Edge Teeth

The three-blade serration is hardened to effectively improve the sharpness and wear resistance. The cutting speed of the saw is 3 times faster than that of an ordinary saw.

Over length: 12”（about: 310mm)

Blade material : SK5 steel

Double edged size TPI: one side tooth is 14TPI, other size is 17TPI.

From the brand

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Powered by the wave of Smart Home, we are keen to linking every of our DIY lovers with smart tools in a simple manner.

Our vision is to empower the imagnation through continuous innovation of our technology!

GoGonova Hot Glue Gun&Heat Gun

DIYer’s Choices

Multi-purposed Tool

【3 Adjustable Speeds】- GoGonova cordless rotary tool can realize 3 variable speeds (5000/12000/18000 RPM), it allows you to adjust and control the polishing speed precisely to meet the power of different scenarios, making your artwork DIY creation a quite easy thing. With different materials like wood, soft metal, plastic, stone, the miracle creation is right on your hands!
【Ergonomic & Compact Design】- Amazingly compact size and rubber wrapped around the body makes the tool easy to grip and control. The keyless chuck promise a simple and tool-free replacement. This makes them perfect not only for a wide range of household tasks, including repairs and maintenance, but also for crafting and hobbies. There are even rotary tool attachments designed to care for pets’ toenails.
【Overload Protection】- The tool body is designed with several vent holes, which helps to dissipate the heat continuously for longer time using. Moreover, the overload protection system would stop the motor in case of unanticipated situations. The groove power button design of this rotary tool help you get rid of worrying about stopping the rotating by touching the switch accidentally.
【ALL-IN-ONE With 43 Accessories】- One little tool for multiple purposes! This rotatory tool come with 43 accessories is perfect for a variety of light-duty handy works. Grinding, polishing, curving, sanding, engraving and more light projects, all your need is this convenient all-in-one tool.
【Fantastic Deal】- 1 x GoGonova 4V Cordless Rotatory Tool; 1 x Storage Box; 43 x Accessories; 1 x USB-C Cable; 1 x Manual.
** KIND REMINDER – This cordless rotary tool is designed for LIGHT-DUTY works only.

  • 15* Sanding Paper & 8* Sanding Bands
  • 5* Cut for Wheels
  • 5* Grinding Stones
  • 5* Diamond Wheel Points
  • 1* Mandrel for Sanding Bands & 1* Mandrel for Cut-off Wheel
  • 1* Hss Cutter, 1* Steel Brush
  • 1* Felt Tip With Shank
  • 1* USB-C Charging Cable

GoGonova 4V Rotary Tool

Why do users stick with GoGonova?

Starting with DIY family, GoGonova has been growing fast and challenging the traditional path of power tools.

Our vision is to empower the imagination through continuous innovation of our technology.

  • Light Weight – 1.2 lbs
  • 3 Speed Adjustments – Up to 18,000 RPM
  • Ergonomic Design – Comfortable Grip
  • Ventilation Mechanism – Smooth Using Experience

Product Description

Jerry & Maggie is a global distributor, developer, and manufacturer of Home Décor and Office Supplies.
We established on the strength of brand names and private label programs in 2011, we develop and craft unrivaled products that drive sales for years. Explore our site to understand and enjoy all we have to offer. There must be a product you like because our designers create our fascination in the heart of the art and love.

Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office

Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants

Jerry & Maggie’s adjustable storage rack is great for storage, organize,and clean up your desktop and workstation. Made of natural wood which provide stability and security.

Adjustable and Style

Features 2 separate parts that can be arranged close together to create a small shelf rack, arranged further apart to create a longer shelf, or set together at any angle you choose to best fit your space and your style.

More space for table

You can have more space for your workstation. You can organize books, office supplies, and other stuff to clean up your desktop space in your ideal way.

Easy installation

The product is assembly required. The storage rack is easy to install and change the direction. You just need to move the parts and arrange the way you need.

Material of natural wood , definitely no pungent scent – non-toxic | green healthy life style | sturdy board
Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office
Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants
Lightweight ( 6 lb ) and 5 units organizer easy to transport and carry – save space on your office desktop – provide more options to meet your style

Product Description

Jerry & Maggie is a global distributor, developer, and manufacturer of Home Décor and Office Supplies.
We established on the strength of brand names and private label programs in 2011, we develop and craft unrivaled products that drive sales for years. Explore our site to understand and enjoy all we have to offer. There must be a product you like because our designers create our fascination in the heart of the art and love.

Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office

Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants

Jerry & Maggie’s adjustable storage rack is great for storage, organize,and clean up your desktop and workstation. Made of natural wood which provide stability and security.

Adjustable and Style

Features 2 separate parts that can be arranged close together to create a small shelf rack, arranged further apart to create a longer shelf, or set together at any angle you choose to best fit your space and your style.

More space for table

You can have more space for your workstation. You can organize books, office supplies, and other stuff to clean up your desktop space in your ideal way.

Easy installation

The product is assembly required. The storage rack is easy to install and change the direction. You just need to move the parts and arrange the way you need.

Material of natural wood , definitely no pungent scent – non-toxic | green healthy life style | sturdy board
Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office
Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants
Lightweight ( 6 lb ) and 5 units organizer easy to transport and carry – save space on your office desktop – provide more options to meet your style
Approximate Displayed Product Measurement (L*H*W): 16*15.8*6.8 inches
